Payments & Delivery

Courier delivery by transport company

Delivery of orders is carried out by transport companies:

  • DHL
  • DHL
  • DHL
  • DHL

The cost of delivery is calculated based on the weight, volume of the cargo and the region of delivery.

You open the package with the courier, inspect for integrity and compliance with the specified configuration.

Pickup from the store

Pickup is carried out by prior call, at the address: NY Some street, 15. Your friend or relative who knows the number and name to whom it is issued can pick up the purchase.

Post delivery

If there is no courier service in your city, you can order delivery via US Post. Immediately upon the arrival of the goods, a notice of the parcel will be sent to your address.

Before receiving, you can evaluate the condition of the box (without opening): weight, integrity. If it seems to you that the order does not meet the parameters or the box is damaged, ask the postal employee to draw up an opening report.

One order can contain no more than 10 items and its value should not exceed $10000.

Delivery period

Depending on your region of residence, delivery takes from 1 day.
